summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx detailing charges for services rendered, including transportation and fuel surcharges. It includes payment instructions and policies regarding invoice adjustments. The invoice is dated May 18, 2001, and outlines specific charges related to shipments made by Eric Gany and Jeanne Brennan.

persons.name: Eric Gany
persons.context: Eric Gany is listed as the sender of a package shipped via FedEx, with specific charges attributed to his account.

persons.name: L. Casey
persons.context: L. Casey is noted as the individual who signed for the delivery of packages.

connections.description: Both Eric Gany and Jeanne Brennan are listed as senders for packages shipped via FedEx.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 18, 2001, and includes charges totaling USD 115.02.
Eric Gany and Jeanne Brennan are both associated with the shipment of packages via FedEx.
L. Casey signed for the delivery of the packages.
The invoice outlines FedEx's policies for requesting adjustments to charges.
There are specific fuel surcharges applied to the transportation charges.
